code: import axios from"axios";export var GET_USER="GET_USER";export var UPDATE_BIO="UPDATE_BIO";export var GET_USER_ERRORS="GET_USER_ERRORS";export var getUser=function getUser(uid){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"api/user/").concat(uid)).then(function(res){console.log("/api/user result",res.data);dispatch({type:GET_USER,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var updateBio=function updateBio(userId,bio){return function(dispatch){return axios({method:"put",url:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"api/user/")+userId,data:{bio:bio}}).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch({type:UPDATE_BIO,payload:bio});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
